thread.title: Katy Perry Post Instagram Note of Remembrance to Jake Bailey
thread.title_full: Katy Perry Post Instagram Note of Remembrance to Jake Bailey

title: Katy Perry Post Instagram Note of Remembrance to Jake Bailey
text: 24 Oct 2015 12:34 PM EST After the devastating news that her friend and longtime makeup artist, Jake Bailey, passed away on October 23, Katy Perry posted a touching note on Instagram. In a caption accompanying several photos of the two together, the singer said to Bailey, “Every time I sit in that chair we shared, just know, no one holds a brush to you, friend.” While he was best known for his work with Perry, his other celebrity clients included stars such as Karlie Kloss, Selena Gomez, Emmy Rossum and Paris Hilton.
